items.text: abstract suspend fun callRecursive(value: T): R
items.desc: Makes recursive call to this DeepRecursiveFunction function putting the call activation frame on the heap, as opposed to the actual call stack that is used by a regular recursive call.

items.text: abstract suspend fun <U, S> DeepRecursiveFunction<U, S>.callRecursive( value: U): S
items.desc: Makes call to the specified DeepRecursiveFunction function putting the call activation frame on the heap, as opposed to the actual call stack that is used by a regular call.

items.text: operator fun DeepRecursiveFunction<*, *>.invoke( value: Any?): Nothing
